hero.title: Hi, I'm <span_tag>Sandra Vargas</span_tag>
hero.description: I'm a <span_tag>Front-end developer</span_tag> with 12+ years of professional experience creating websites and 3 working with web applications. I am like optimizing scalability, accessibility, and UI/UX in all my projects.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: <bold_tag>Coming soon</bold_tag>. In the meantime, you can take a look at this <external_anchor_tag>portfolio's repo</external_anchor_tag> on GitHub, to get an idea of how I like to work on my projects.

items.title: Portfolio
items.subtitle: React Application
items.description: Portfolio based in a tutorial to learn how to use Tailwind CSS with React. I added TypeScript and the libraries i18next and react-i18next.

about.title: About
about.description: <paragraph_tag>I have 12+ years of experience creating websites using things like <abbreviation_tag_1>HTML</abbreviation_tag_1>, <abbreviation_tag_2>CSS</abbreviation_tag_2>, <abbreviation_tag_3>Sass</abbreviation_tag_3>, JavaScript, Grunt, Gulp, WordPress, Git, and more. These projects were with small digital agencies in the US.</paragraph_tag><paragraph_tag>For the last 3 years I've officially switched to working with web applications, and although I am most familiar with the React ecosystem, I am willing to learn and work with other technologies (I am a dabbler in the <abbreviation_tag_4>MERN</abbreviation_tag_4> and <abbreviation_tag_5>PERN</abbreviation_tag_5> stacks).</paragraph_tag>

css-in-js.name: CSS-in-JS
css-in-js.description: Mainly Styled components, but I've also used Emotion CSS and libraries like <external_anchor_tag>Styled System</external_anchor_tag>(https://styled-system.com/).

accessibility.name: Accessibility
accessibility.description: Adhere to <acronym_tag>WCAG</acronym_tag> principles, add relevant ARIA attributes to improve accessibility.

schema-markup.name: Schema markup
schema-markup.description: Use structured data in applicable elements to improve search engine results by making the content more understandable.

css.name: CSS3
css.description: Use modern CSS techniques to style webpages and applications.

proficiencyDescription.beginner: Although it's not my main focus, I'm familiar with these technologies, mainly by following tutorials and courses I purchased since I wanted to learn more about them.
proficiencyDescription.medium: I am highly interested in these technologies and I actively use them in personal projects. I'm confident that I can solve issues I might encounter with them.
proficiencyDescription.advanced: I've used these technologies professionally, either in a freelance project or at a full-time job.

languages.title: Languages
languages.note: I am currently studying Japanese and French, and as a language learner I am really interested in <abbreviation_tag>i18n</abbreviation_tag>, and how different languages impact an application's layout and overall UI/UX.

contact.title: Contact me
contact.description: Want to work together on a project? Have a question about my experience? Fill out the contact form and I’ll get back to you.

availability.notAvailable: I'm currently <not_available_tag>not available</not_available_tag> for freelance work.

result.error: Something went wrong and message could not be sent.
